about_the_game:
We recommend that you do not play this DLC unless you have completed the base game "Hospital 9".

Short First Person Adventure game.
The game is a free add-on to Hospital 9.

A sequel to a story in a base game.

About game
Short First Person Adventure game.
Locate the objects in the investigation zone in the building, and select the correct answer from the choices.
If you answer all the questions correctly, you can complete the game.

Story
The Bureau of Investigation's Mai Sato went to investigate for final confirmation.

How to play
You can select this game when you push "PLAY" on STEAM app.

Method of operation

Move: W, A, S, D
Jump: Space key
Interact: Left mouse click
Pause menu: ESC key

content_descriptors.notes: Includes references to concoction of drugs.

name: Hospital 9 - Mai's Report

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT, Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space

short_description: Short First Person Adventure game. The game is a free add-on to Hospital 9.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
